entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
